name: Nuclear Winter (Daxid)
description:
Welcome to hell

Contemplate a calm but brutal post nuclear world and try to make your whole team survive... Will you be able to save them all?

Gameplay

Choose your path, take notes, save them all. Easy... or is it?
Oh and enjoy the 10 animated panels while you're at it!

Game made with <3 for the GOTMJam #12 following the theme "Winter"!

By Dax & Sar (and Al)
